content.question: Which of the following best describes electricity generation using wind turbines?

choices.label: Newer wind turbines can generate consistent electricity even when there is no wind.
Wind turbines can be constructed on either vertical or horizontal axes.
Wind turbines are rarely used offshore because they tend to float in rough seas.
Wind turbines can be used by individual homeowners but have limited effectiveness when connected to the electrical grid.

content.answer: Wind turbines can be constructed on either vertical or horizontal axes.
